data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will continue to affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. A band of clouds will also bring one or two rain patches to the region. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach southern China on Tuesday night to early Wednesday. It will be slightly cooler in the morning over the region in the middle and latter parts of this week. With the band of clouds thinning out gradually, the temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas in the latter part of this week. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Koto will linger over the central part of the South China Sea tomorrow. It will then move towards the vicinity of the southern part of Vietnam and weaken gradually in the following couple of days. On the other hand, Tropical Depression Senyar over the seas east of the Malay Peninsula will move across the southern part of the South China Sea today and tomorrow and dissipate gradually.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251201","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches in the morning.
